meanings.definition: The quality or state of being numerous or existing in great quantities.
meanings.sent1: The multitudinousness of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinousness of options at the buffet overwhelmed me.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinousness of socks in the laundry basket made me question my sock-buying habits.
meanings.sent4: The multitudinousness of tasks on her to-do list loomed over her like a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinousness of colors in the painting created a vibrant and lively scene.

meanings.sent1: The multitudinousness of fans at the concert created an electrifying atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The multitudinousness of books in the library was a bookworm's paradise.
meanings.sent3: The multitudinousness of ducks in the pond was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The multitudinousness of leaves on the trees painted a beautiful autumn landscape.
meanings.sent5: The multitudinousness of students in the school made for a bustling campus.
